description.value:
Cold

Aura 5

Each creature that enters the aura or starts its turn there takes 20 cold damage. The ground is coated with ice and becomes difficult terrain, and the squares of the aura are lightly obscured.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Cold

Standard

Reach 4

+33 vs AC; 3d6+9 cold damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 4

+33 vs AC; 2d8+9 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The dragon makes a bite attack, shifts 3 squares, and then makes two claw attacks against a different target.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Close burst 4

Trigger: When an enemy misses the dragon with a melee or close attack, at-will

+28 vs Fortitude; 2d8+9 damage, and the dragon pushes the target 3 squares.

Standard, Recharges When First Bloodied

Close burst 4

Trigger: When first bloodied

Targets slowed or restrained creatures; +30 vs AC; 4d8+9 damage, the dragon pushes the target 3 squares, and the target is knocked prone. This forced movement can affect a creature restrained by the dragon's own breath weapon.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Cold

Standard

Close blast 5

+28 vs Fortitude; 3d10+9 cold damage, and the target is restrained (save ends). Aftereffect: The target is slowed (save ends). Miss: Half damage.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Cold, Zone

Standard

Area burst 3 within 20

+30 vs Fortitude; 2d10+9 cold damage, and the target is slowed and weakened (save ends both). Miss: Half damage. Effect: The burst becomes a zone of freezing fog. It is difficult terrain and the squares within it are heavily obscured. The zone persists until the dragon uses this power again or until the end of the encounter.

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +28 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

system.biography:
HP 1004; Bloodied 502 ; see also bloodied breath
Resist 30 cold 		Init +18 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 41Fort 41Ref 37Will 39
Speed 8 (ice walk), fly 12 (hover), overland flight 15
Ability ScoresStr 28 (+22)
Con 27 (+21)		Dex 20 (+18)
Int 16 (+16)		Wis 19 (+17)
Cha 24 (+20)
Languages Common, Draconic
Alignment Unaligned
Skills Athletics +27, Endurance +26, Intimidate +25Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 27 | Insight 27
